price: 53.Malayka Nabii Ibraahimik :ma meesitin diggah nanu kol kah nemeetem ixxiga Íe baxal koo ayti kumusnamkeh iyyaanama kaak itte.
arabic: قَالُواْ لَا تَوۡجَلۡ إِنَّا نُبَشِّرُكَ بِغُلَٰمٍ عَلِيمٖ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: qālū lā tawjal innā nubashiruka bighulāmin ʿalīmin
